files.content:
aws_region   = "us-east-1"
project      = "http-echo"
environment  = "dev"

# Required: the app exits if ECHO_TEXT is empty
echo_text = "hello-world"

# Optional custom domain
# domain_name    = "api.example.com"
# hosted_zone_id = "Z1234567890ABCDEFG"

# Optional WAF
# enable_waf = true

# Optional GitHub OIDC (recommended instead of long-lived AWS keys)
# github_org  = "your-org"
# github_repo = "your-repo"
